properties.description: Proposal to replace the full 494m of fencing surrounding the site to better aid the security of the school. A previously approved application (Planning Approval No. 08F/2010) allowed for 148m of the existing fencing situated above a retaining wall to be replaced with Securifor 2D powder coated green. However, the client now wishes that all fencing to replaced with Zenith Welded Mesh Panel Fencing System powder coated blue.
